thread.title: FB Financial Corporation Announces 2018 First Quarter Earnings Call

author: cnbc.com
title: FB Financial Corporation Announces 2018 First Quarter Earnings Call

organizations.name: fb financial corporation fb financial corporation

text:
NASHVILLE, Tenn.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- FB Financial Corporation (“FB Financial” or “the Company”) (NYSE: FBK) announced today that it will release its 2018 first quarter results on Monday, April 23, 2018, after the close of the market. The Company will host a first quarter earnings conference call at 8:00 a.m. CDT on Tuesday, April 24, 2018, and the earnings conference call will be broadcast live over the Internet at https://services.choruscall.com/links/fbk180424zLhPumL4.html . For investors or analysts who want to participate during the call, the listen only dial-in number is 877-440-5804. For those unable to listen live, a 30-day online replay of the webcast will be available approximately an hour following the conclusion of the live broadcast. A link to these events can be found on the Company’s website at https://www.firstbankonline.com/ .
About FB Financial Corporation
FB Financial Corporation (NYSE: FBK) is a bank holding company headquartered in Nashville, Tennessee. FB Financial operates through its wholly owned banking subsidiary, FirstBank, the third largest Tennessee-headquartered bank, with 56 full-service bank branches across Tennessee, North Alabama and North Georgia, and a national mortgage business with offices across the Southeast. FirstBank serves five of the largest metropolitan markets in Tennessee and has approximately $4.7 billion in total assets.
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180412006256/en/
